about_the_game:
Features


An inconceivable disaster strikes nature as Luna finds the skies once in unity, now full of lost souls. To save these souls Luna must unlock new abilities as she flies to new heights to rescue the children she once held dear to her.

  • Single-player adventure full of secrets with a self-driven narrative of the impeckable unrelenting motherly love
  • Save over 100 lost souls in over 300+ screens of puzzling platforming challenges
  • Game+ that only veterans can fly over this impossible challenge

FeatherCall brings the simplistic platformer experience with a twist! Discover and unlock new feathers along your journey! Each feather will allow Luna to perform the following ability: Dash, Throw, or Glide.

  • Throw: Luna throws a spiraling blue feather that will bounce off walls and interact with objects
  • Dash: Luna sends herself flying towards the nearest dashable object (typically the feather)
  • Glide: Luna halts her fall to a stop and gracefully descends to safety

FeatherCall brings the simplistic platformer experience with a twist! Discover and unlock new feathers along your journey! Each feather will allow Luna to perform the following ability: Dash, Throw, or Glide.

name: FeatherCall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: FeatherCall is a fast pace, puzzle platformer where you help Luna, a mother blue bird, rescue her lost children. Brave numerous challenges and puzzles by Dashing to new heights, Throwing a guiding feather, and Gliding back to safety!
